response.original_title: Paths of Edith Stein: Fr. Mitch Pacwa’s Investigation
response.overview: Journey with Fr. Pacwa to study the life of Jewish philosopher, turned Discalced Carmelite nun, Edith Stein, and how she found Christ, and make the ultimate sacrifice in Auschwitz.
response.title: Paths of Edith Stein: Fr. Mitch Pacwa’s Investigation
